issues.description: The problem statementâ€™s UML specifies the abstract method messageOnFeed() in Animal as public (+), but the solution defines it as protected. This visibility mismatch could confuse students about the intended access level of the method.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the declaration of messageOnFeed() in Animal.java to 'public abstract String messageOnFeed();' so that it matches the UML specification.
